AboutPage.title: About
AboutPage.description: Forma AI is an AI-powered architectural visualization platform helping architects, interior designers, and urban planners transform their design concepts into stunning visuals.
AboutPage.introduction: üëã Welcome to Forma AI! We're building the future of architectural visualization with AI. Transform sketches into renders, generate facade designs, create analysis diagrams - all powered by cutting-edge AI technology. Questions? We're here to help.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Professional Visualization Tools
features.description: Everything architects and designers need in one powerful AI platform

item-1.title: 9 Architectural Styles
item-1.description: From Modern Minimalist to Parametric, Brutalist to Watercolor - choose the perfect style for your project

item-2.title: Smart Image Enhancement
item-2.description: AI-powered prompt enhancement with professional architectural terminology for better results

item-3.title: Multiple Aspect Ratios
item-3.description: Support for 1:1, 16:9, 4:3, 3:4, and 9:16 - perfect for any presentation format

item-4.title: Edit & Iterate
item-4.description: Upload reference images and edit with natural language to refine your visualizations

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that fits your workflow

item-1.question: What types of architectural visualizations can I create?
item-1.answer: Forma AI supports style transfers, white model to render conversions, floor plan coloring, facade design, section diagrams, analysis diagrams (Sasaki style, sunlight, circulation), interior perspectives, and more.

item-2.question: What image formats are supported?
item-2.answer: We support PNG, JPEG, WebP, and GIF for input images. Output images are generated in high-quality PNG format.

item-3.question: How do credits work?
item-3.answer: Each generation costs credits based on the model used. Forma AI uses 1 credit, Forma AI Pro uses 3 credits. You can purchase credit packs or subscribe for monthly credits.

item-4.question: Can I use the generated images commercially?
item-4.answer: Yes! All images generated with Forma AI can be used for commercial projects, client presentations, and publications.

item-5.question: Need help or have questions?
item-5.answer: Contact our support team at support@nanobanana.com - we're here to help you create stunning visualizations.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.subtitle: Trusted by architects and designers worldwide

item-1.name: Sarah Chen
item-1.quote: Forma AI has transformed how I present my designs to clients. The quality is incredible.

item-2.name: Michael Park
item-2.quote: What used to take hours now takes minutes. This tool is essential for any modern architect.

item-3.name: Emma Wilson
item-3.quote: The analysis diagrams feature alone is worth it. Saves me hours of manual work.

item-4.name: David Kim
item-4.quote: Incredible tool for masterplan visualization. Highly recommend for any design firm.

item-5.name: Lisa Zhang
item-5.quote: Our team productivity has increased significantly since adopting Forma AI.

item-6.name: James Rodriguez
item-6.quote: The style presets are amazing. Perfect for exploring different design directions.

item-7.name: Anna Mueller
item-7.quote: Finally, an AI tool that understands architectural visualization needs.

item-8.name: Robert Taylor
item-8.quote: The facade generation feature has streamlined our renovation projects.

item-9.name: Sophie Chen
item-9.quote: Outstanding results every time. This is the future of architectural visualization.

item-10.name: Marcus Johnson
item-10.quote: Client presentations have never been more impressive. Forma AI delivers.

item-11.name: Elena Rodriguez
item-11.quote: The workflow integration is seamless. Fits perfectly into our design process.

item-12.name: Thomas Wright
item-12.quote: An essential tool for modern architectural practice. Worth every penny.
